text: yadi mominon mein se do giroh aapas mein lad pade to unake beech sulah kara do. phir yadi unamen se ek giroh doosare par zyaadatee kare, to jo giroh zyaadatee kar raha ho usase lado, yahaan tak ki vah allaah ke aadesh kee or palat aae. phir yadi vah palat aae to unake beech nyaay ke saath sulah kara do, aur inasaaf karo. nishchay hee allaah inasaaf karanevaalon ko pasand karata hai
